Source code for maxairesources.utilities.encryption

import binascii
import itertools



[docs]class Encryption():

    def __init__(self) -> None:
        pass


[docs]    @staticmethod
    def encrypt(msg, key):
        cipher = ''.join([chr(ord(x)^ord(y)) for x, y in zip(msg, itertools.cycle(key))])
        cipher = (binascii.hexlify(cipher.encode())).decode()
        return cipher



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def decrypt(cipher, key):
        cipher = (binascii.unhexlify(cipher.encode())).decode()
        msg = ''.join([chr(ord(x)^ord(y)) for x, y in zip(cipher, itertools.cycle(key))])
        return msg



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def encrypt_columns(df,df_type,key='myKey',prefix="f_"):
        columns = df.columns
        encrpted_cols = [f"{prefix}{Encryption.encrypt(col,key)}" for col in columns]
        if df_type == "spark":
            df = df.toDF(*encrpted_cols)
        elif df_type == "pandas":
            df = df.copy()
            df.columns = encrpted_cols
        return df



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def decrypt_columns(df,df_type,key='myKey',prefix="f_"):
        columns = df.columns
        decrypted_cols = [Encryption.decrypt(col.replace(prefix,"",1),key) for col in columns ]
        if df_type == "spark":
            df = df.toDF(*decrypted_cols)
        elif df_type == "pandas":
            df.columns = decrypted_cols
        return df
